attributes.action: Stop penalising young drivers on car insurance!
attributes.additional_details: Because you pay young people less money at work because they’re young but charge them more on insurance
attributes.background: Why should us as young drivers be charged large amounts of money driving a shitty car but 79 year old Dorris who can’t see properly only has to pay £40 a month on her merc

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the cost of car insurance for young people, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
